title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When trying to open a file (e.g. test.xml) with a different editor type (e.g. Default Text Editor) while the file is already open in the scripted resource editor example, nothing happens. The scripted resource editor example remains active and the test.xml file is not opened in the new editor.
EB: When trying to open a file (e.g. test.xml) with a different editor type (e.g. Default Text Editor) while the file is already open in the scripted resource editor example, the test.xml file should be opened in the new editor. The scripted resource editor example should be deactivated.
SR:
1. Open the application (1GEWMOZ)
2. Create a new basic project
3. Create a new file called test.xml
4. Confirm that the default editor for XML files is the scripted resource editor example
5. Select test.xml in the Navigator
6. Right-click and choose 'Open With...'
7. Select 'Default Text Editor'
8. Verify that the test.xml file is not opened in the new editor, and the scripted resource editor example remains active
